mapper.select: SELECT w.id, w.work_order_id, w.employee_id, e.name AS employee_name, s1.name AS dept_name, s2.name AS pos_name FROM WORKER w JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON w.employee_id = e.id JOIN DETAIL_SYS_CODE s1 ON e.dept_code = s1.detail_code JOIN DETAIL_SYS_CODE s2 ON e.position_code = s2.detail_code WHERE w.work_order_id = #{srhOrderId} ORDER BY w.id DESC

SELECT e.id AS employee_id, e.name AS employee_name, s1.name AS dept_name, s2.name AS pos_name FROM EMPLOYEE e JOIN DETAIL_SYS_CODE s1 ON e.dept_code = s1.detail_code JOIN DETAIL_SYS_CODE s2 ON e.position_code = s2.detail_code WHERE e.dept_code = 'DEP006' -- 생산부서 AND e.quit_date IS NULL -- 재직중 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WORKER w JOIN WORK_ORDER wo ON w.work_order_id = wo.id WHERE w.employee_id = e.id AND wo.status_code != 'WKS004' -- 작업이 완료되지 않은 직원 ) ORDER BY e.id DESC
